entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:16 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 03:58 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: W 21 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
